mapper.sql: id, username, password, cellphone, email, created, created_by, modified, modified_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( username, password, cellphone, email, created, created_by, modified, modified_by VALUES (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
